pkgmetadata.longdescription: Estimation of Ploidy and Detection of Aneuploidy Using Genotyping Data // Provides functions for estimating ploidy levels and detecting aneuploidy in individuals using allele intensities or allele count data from high-throughput genotyping platforms, including single nucleotide polymorphism (SNP) arrays and sequencing-based technologies. Implements an extended version of the 'PennCNV' signal standardization method by Wang et al. (2007) doi:10.1101/gr.6861907 for higher ploidy levels. Computes B-allele frequencies (BAF), z-scores, and identifies copy number variation patterns.
